locations.address: 123 Central Park West, New York, NY 10023
locations.view_snapshot: A sprawling urban oasis with winding paths, serene lakes, and iconic bridges surrounded by towering skyscrapers.
The famous avenue lined with luxury shops, theaters, and cafes, leading to the majestic Arc de Triomphe.
The world's busiest pedestrian crossing with neon billboards, bustling crowds, and the iconic Hachiko statue.
The ancient amphitheater stands majestically against the Roman sky, surrounded by historic ruins and modern city life.

locations.address: 202 Sydney Opera House, Bennelong Point, Sydney NSW 2000
locations.view_snapshot: The iconic white sails of the opera house reflect in the harbor waters with the Sydney Harbour Bridge in the background.
Ancient Incan ruins perched high in the Andes mountains, surrounded by misty peaks and terraced landscapes.
